item.title: Don’t Forget This Week’s Center of Gravity!
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 4:00 PM - 10:00 PM - The Center of Gravity is your one-stop for personal, academic and well-being success this summer! Activities include novelty food and snacks, academic support from peer tutors and course TAs, away semester searches with the CCPD, wellness and well-being activities, water coloring, Legos, book clubs and more, so be sure to visit weekly!
item.author: Community

item.title: Men’s Hockey Announces 2024-25 Roster Additions
item.description: Rensselaer’s men’s hockey program and head coach Dave Smith have announced the 11 roster additions for the Engineers’ upcoming 2024-25 season. Composed of seven freshmen and four transfers, the incoming class features five forwards, four defensemen, and two goalies.
item.author: Community

item.title: Frear Park Event to Feature Flower Planting, Trails Walk
item.description: Date: Wednesday, July 10, 2024 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Help plant native wildflower plants in Frear Park, and then enjoy a 1.5 mile nature trail walk! This event is open to all and will include lunch; please contact Professor Bram if interested.
item.author: Students

item.title: New York City Ballet: Swan Lake, Stars and Stripes at SPAC
item.description: Date: Friday, July 12, 2024 7:30 PM - 10:30 PM - Never seen the NYC Ballet before? Now’s your chance to see them at SPAC, courtesy of the Rensselaer Union! The event features the return of three beloved Balanchine works, as well as additional scenes from Coppélia. Limited free tickets and transportation are available beginning Tuesday, July 9 at the Union Admin Office.
item.author: Students

item.title: Collegiate Store Offering Birthday Specials for Faculty, Staff
item.description: The Collegiate Store is happy to announce that it will be celebrating RPI faculty and staff birthdays with an invitation to shop for one clothing or gift item at 20% off. Beginning in March 2024, faculty and staff can just come in during their birthday month to get their coupon, which can then be used in-store or online.
item.author: Faculty and Staff

item.title: Rensselaer at Work Graduate Program Preview to be Held July 9
item.description:
Date: Tuesday, July 9, 2024 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM - RSVP to join Dean Aric Krause, Ph.D. for a review of Rensselaer at Work’s part-time, project-based online graduate certificate and degree programs that are mentored by industry experts. Attendees will learn about programs in Engineering, Analytics, Leadership, and Technical Change Management, as well as the newly-released Program Management Certificate. Light refreshments will be provided.

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
